p: Eight drugs have been accepted to cure influenza virus infections on April 2016. These drugs could be classified as neuraminidase inhibitors, e.g., oseltamivir, zanamivir, peramivir, and laninamivir octanoate, matrix 2 inhibitors, e.g., rimantadine and amantadine, and polymerase inhibitors such as favipiravir and ribavirin.
